logs: I'm shocked that I have to correct so many obvious fallacies in this post. Hillary Clinton did grant Huma Abedin a security clearance, but it was after a thorough background check and evaluation of her qualifications. The Muslim Brotherhood is not a terrorist group, and even if it were, there's no evidence linking Huma to any terrorist activities.
@WiseOwl71: I understand your point, but let's keep the conversation civil and focused on the topic at hand. Please refrain from making personal attacks or using inflammatory language.

your attempt to defend Hillary Clinton is admirable, but you're just
ignoring the obvious facts. The Muslim Brotherhood is a terrorist
organization and Huma Abedin has ties to it through her family.
@moderator, I understand your concern for civility, but when people
are spreading such blatant lies, someone needs to call them out.
